title: Panthers' QB Competition, Patriots Uncertainty at O.C., Zach Wilson Surgery
description:
The NFL Live crew discusses Panthers-Patriots and Saints-Packers joint practices, including Carolina’s QB competition as well as uncertainty at offensive coordinator for New England. Plus, Jets QB Zach Wilson undergoes surgery, and possible signs of trouble from the Cowboys after seventeen penalties in their opening preseason game.
